methods.name: public abstract void onAvailabilityChanged(int status)
methods.comment: * Called when the availability of the sound model changes.

methods.name: public abstract void onDetected(@NonNull EventPayload eventPayload)
methods.comment:
* Called when the sound model has triggered (such as when it matched a
         * given sound pattern).

methods.name: public abstract void onError()
methods.comment: *  Called when the detection fails due to an error.

methods.name: public abstract void onRecognitionPaused()
methods.comment:
* Called when the recognition is paused temporarily for some reason.
         * This is an informational callback, and the clients shouldn't be doing anything here
         * except showing an indication on their UI if they have to.

methods.name: public abstract void onRecognitionResumed()
methods.comment:
* Called when the recognition is resumed after it was temporarily paused.
         * This is an informational callback, and the clients shouldn't be doing anything here
         * except showing an indication on their UI if they have to.

methodNames: public abstract void onDetected(@NonNull EventPayload eventPayload)
